message: I shoot up on the sofa.
...How long was I out?
When I look at my Coil, I'm relieved to see that only fifteen minutes have passed.
My headache is gone. Clear's song really worked wonders...
Wait, where is he? I don't see him anywhere.
Ren's gone too. Maybe they went downstairs.
As I get up off the couch, I hear voices from downstairs.

name: クリア
message: "Why don't you call Master 'Master?'"

name: 蓮
message: "What do you mean?"
I peer over the handrail.

name: クリア
message: "Aren't you Master's Allmate? He owns you, so that makes him your master."

name: 蓮
message: "That's true."

name: クリア
message: "Then why don't you call him Master?"

name: 蓮
message: "You're correct in terms of our relationship, but to me, Aoba is just Aoba. There's no need for me to call him 'Master.'"

name: クリア
message: "That makes it sound like you're his equal. But you aren't, are you?"

name: 蓮
message: "I believe that is more an issue with how Aoba sees things, rather than with my perspective. I simply follow his lead."

name: クリア
message: "I see. I'm not sure I'll ever understand."

name: 蓮
message: "Well, Aoba is his name."

name: クリア
message: "But Master is my master."
...This conversation is going nowhere fast.
Clear calls me "Master" because he decided, for one reason or other, that I'm his master.
But I guess that means he'd call any master "Master," not just me.
Well... Like, take Mr. Haga. I call him "boss," which is kind of the same thing, right? No big deal.
Downstairs, the argument continues.
I decide to head down and break the stalemate.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's all this nonsense?"

name: クリア
message: "Master!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"

name: クリア
message: "Were you listening?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, I just happened to overhear some of it."

name: クリア
message: "Then what do you think about the issue, Master?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I think you should do whatever you want, really."

name: クリア
message: "Whatever I want? What do you mean?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You can call me Master if you want. But I'd rather be called by my own name."

name: クリア
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, let me ask. Would you call anyone other than me 'Master?'"

name: クリア
message: "Well..."
Clear considers this for a moment.

name: クリア
message: "...That's a good question. I never considered the possibility that I might have another master..."

name: クリア
message: "...but if such a person were to appear, I guess I would call them 'Master.'"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thought so."

name: クリア
message: "Did I say something odd?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. It's just like, I mean this is just my opinion here, but my name's Aoba, right?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And, like, 'Master' is something you could call anyone who fit the bill, and I guess something about that makes it feel kinda distant."

name: クリア
message: "Distant?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, but it's not a big deal. I know you're always thinking about me."

name: クリア
message: "Of course I am."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then that's enough. Now let's get ready to head out."

name: クリア
message: "...Okay."
Though he still seems unconvinced, Clear heads upstairs.
...It really doesn't bother me that much.
I just hope Clear doesn't worry about it too much either...
I pick Ren up and head back upstairs to get ready.
